fields.name: stop_sequence
fields.description: Order of stops for this trip

fields.name: stop_headsign
fields.description: Text that appears on signage identifying the trip's destination

fields.name: pickup_type
fields.description: Indicates pickup method (0=regular, 1=no pickup, 2=must phone, 3=must coordinate)

fields.name: drop_off_type
fields.description: Indicates drop off method (0=regular, 1=no drop off, 2=must phone, 3=must coordinate)

fields.name: timepoint
fields.description: Indicates if arrival/departure times are exact (0=approximate, 1=exact)

fields.name: shape_dist_traveled
fields.description: Distance traveled along the shape from the first stop

fields.name: feed_hash
fields.description: Hash of the GTFS feed for data lineage

description: Stop times and sequences for GTFS schedule feeds
